StdVar.Name: sysReleaseIdent
StdVar.Description: Defines the release ID for the system that is published into various portions of the web site to identify the software release and configuration.

StdVar.Name: webEmailId
StdVar.Description: Defines the web e-mail contact address published into various portion of the web site. This is the general purpose contact email address

StdVar.Name: companyTitle
StdVar.Description: Defines the company title published into various points in the web pages. This is a slightly less formal signature than the CompanyName variable.

StdVar.Name: webCopyright
StdVar.Description: Defines the text of the copyright statements published into the web pages.

StdVar.Name: companyName
StdVar.Description: Defines the company name published into various points in the web pages. This is the more formal, official company legal name.
